message_gift_not_admin: You are not Admin or you can't managed messages!
giveaway_registry_error:
The giveaway was canceled because the bot was unable to get the ID
your post for editing. Please try again. **Write us what exactly happened.
We are trying to fix this bug. Support guild:** https://discord.gg/UrWG3R683d
gift_invalid_number_description:
The number of winners must be less than the number of participants!
You entered a number: `%s`
Number of participants: `%s`
This action did not cause the deletion: **Giveaway**!
gift_invalid_number_description_loop:
In order not to get loop, we had to reduce the number
of winners by one. Since their number was equal to the participants
language_change_not_admin: You are not Admin or you can't managed server
slash_stop_no_has: Currently there is no active Giveaway
slash_stop_errors: You have not completed the Giveaway
slash_errors: You made a mistake, look at the documentation
send_slash_message: Created Giveaway in the text channel: <#%s>
gift_special_role: This Giveaway only for a Special Role: <@&%s>
slash_error_256: The number of characters in the name should not exceed 256!
slash_error_role_can_not_be_everyone: `@everyone` can only be used to mention!
button_giveaway_not_access: You don't have access to [this](%s) Giveaway!
button_dont_worry:
Don't worry, you're a participant.
We checked you in the database.
button_you_not_register:
It looks like we haven't registered you yet.
`Try again after 5 seconds`. If it happens again, write to us in support.
The link is available in the bot profile.
gift_permissions: The bot has all the necessary permissions in: <#%s>
start_in_thread: It is forbidden to create <@808277484524011531> in Thread!
start_in_not_text_channels: You can create <@808277484524011531> only in TextChannels!
gift_registered: We have successfully registered you in [Giveaway](%s)
button_notification_deny: Now the bot will not notify you!
button_notification_accept: Now the bot will notify you!
no_access_reroll: Most likely you don't have access or the Giveaway ID is incorrect
errors_descriptions:
Don't worry, we will complete your Giveaway automatically when it becomes possible.
If you still have questions, ask us them.
errors_descriptions_again:
Don't worry, the task is already running.
We will complete your Giveaway as soon as we can.
schedule_start:
Launch date and time: <t:%s:R> (<t:%s:f>)
End date and time: %s
In the channel: <#%s>
